data.why:
A teeny tiny new module Sys::Getpagesize which calls the C system
    getpagesize function.

    A new top level module tentatively called DmiDecode that is a perl
    object oriented interface that can access DMI, or SMBIOS information
    on (initially) x86 systems running linux. This is patterned after
    the dmidecode C program currently maintained by Jean Delvare
    <khali@linux-fr.org>, originally by Alan Cox.
